concept.description: Labels all classes annotated with javax.ejb.Stateless with "EJB" and "STATELESS".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:CLASS)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(d:CLASS) WHERE d.FQN="javax.ejb.Stateless" SET c:EJB, c:STATELESS
